attacks.name: Attract Current
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. For each heads, you may search your deck for a L Energy card and attach it to 1 of your L Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Gigavolt
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage. If tails, this attack does 40 damage and the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
